name: DevSecCon Singapore
content: We are returning to Singapore once again for 2 days packed with the latest insights, inspiration and practical take aways about DevSecOps! We will bring together DevOps and Security in a unique DevSecOps conference run by practitioners, for practitioners. Join us for two days filled with inspiring talks and interactive workshops about DevSecOps â€“ the practice of building security into development processes. This is your chance to learn from key industry experts, meet with your peers and learn how DevOps and Security can work together to make continuously secure development a reality.
